record.title: NATIONAL MPS AWARENESS DAY

speaking.paragraph: I ask unanimous consent the Senate now proceed to S. Res. 198.

record.chair: The clerk will report the resolution by title.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:

speaking.paragraph: I ask unanimous consent that the resolution be agreed to, the preamble be agreed to, and the motion to reconsider be laid on the table.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
